name: EnableTirePopping
warnings: This function was removed in SA-MP 0.3. Tire popping is enabled by default. If you want to disable tire popping, you'll have to manually script it using OnVehicleDamageStatusUpdate.
description: With this function you can enable or disable tire popping.

params_body.name: show
params_body.description: 1 to enable, 0 to disable tire popping.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
